apis.description: Access to all of the churned projects.

operations.summary: Returns all of the churn projects.

apis.description: Access to a projects single commit data

operations.summary: Returns a single commit by commit id and project_path

parameters.name: project_path
parameters.description: The project_name for which this commit belongs to

parameters.name: commit
parameters.description: The commit id which points to this commit data

apis.description: Starts generating churn report against HEAD of project_path

operations.summary: Starts generating churn report against HEAD of project_path

parameters.name: project_path
parameters.description: The project_name for which a churn report will be generated against

parameters.name: existing
parameters.description: If we only need to add commit data as the report already exists

operations.summary: Returns a single churn project by project_name

parameters.name: project_name
parameters.description: The project_name of the churn project to be returned

apis.description: Create a new churn project resource

operations.summary: creates a new churn project by project_name

parameters.name: project_name
parameters.description: The project_name of the churn project to be created
